title: An Effective Learnt Clause Minimization Approach for CDCL SAT Solvers.
abstract: Research partially supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (Grants no. 61370183, 61370184, 61472147), the Generalitat de Catalunya grant AGAUR 2014-SGR-118, and the MINECO-FEDER project RASO TIN2015-71799-C2-1-P.
